General.Name: AimCore Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: AimCore Technology Co., Ltd operates as a sputtering company in Taiwan and internationally. It offers touch panel ITO, TN/STN LCD ITO, black matrix, and color filter top ITO glasses for applications in LCD, touch, and organic ELD panels. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: Hsinchu Industrial Park, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 30351
